## IToolbox interface

Interface for a toolbox.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IToolbox extends IRegistrable, IFocusableTree 
```
**Extends:** [IRegistrable](./blockly.iregistrable_interface.md)<!-- -->, [IFocusableTree](./blockly.ifocusabletree_interface.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [clearSelection()](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.clearselection_1_methodsignature.md) | Unhighlights any previously selected item. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.dispose_1_methodsignature.md) | Disposes of this toolbox. |
|  [getFlyout()](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.getflyout_1_methodsignature.md) | Gets the toolbox flyout. |
|  [getHeight()](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.getheight_1_methodsignature.md) | Gets the height of the toolbox. |
|  [getSelectedItem()](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.getselecteditem_1_methodsignature.md) | Gets the selected item. |
|  [getWidth()](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.getwidth_1_methodsignature.md) | Gets the width of the toolbox. |
|  [getWorkspace()](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.getworkspace_1_methodsignature.md) | Gets the workspace for the toolbox. |
|  [handleToolboxItemResize()](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.handletoolboxitemresize_1_methodsignature.md) | Handles resizing the toolbox when a toolbox item resizes. |
|  [init()](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.init_1_methodsignature.md) | Initializes the toolbox. |
|  [isHorizontal()](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.ishorizontal_1_methodsignature.md) | Gets whether or not the toolbox is horizontal. |
|  [position()](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.position_1_methodsignature.md) | Positions the toolbox based on whether it is a horizontal toolbox and whether the workspace is in rtl. |
|  [refreshSelection()](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.refreshselection_1_methodsignature.md) | Updates the flyout's content without closing it. Should be used in response to a change in one of the dynamic categories, such as variables or procedures. |
|  [refreshTheme()](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.refreshtheme_1_methodsignature.md) | Updates the category colours and background colour of selected categories. |
|  [render(toolboxDef)](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.render_1_methodsignature.md) | Fills the toolbox with new toolbox items and removes any old contents. |
|  [selectItemByPosition(position)](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.selectitembyposition_1_methodsignature.md) | Selects the toolbox item by its position in the list of toolbox items. |
|  [setSelectedItem(item)](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.setselecteditem_1_methodsignature.md) | Sets the selected item. |
|  [setVisible(isVisible)](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.setvisible_1_methodsignature.md) | Sets the visibility of the toolbox. |
